Quand le docteur s'est effondré, j'ai eu l'impression que ma poitrine était comme comprimée, que ma tête était vide et c'est à peine si je pouvais me tenir debout... Est-ce ce sentiment qu'on appelle tristesse... ? Je ne veux plus jamais le ressentir...
Je le vivrais mal si vous vous effondrez. Prenez les pauses nécessaires. Je sais réparer les homoncules, mais pas les humains.
C'est étrange, mais mes palpitations s'accélèrent lorsque je suis près du docteur Mertillier. C'est aussi légèrement le cas en votre présence. Pourquoi ?
Il paraît qu'aujourd'hui est le jour où vous avez été créé. C'est une journée mémorable. Toutes mes félicitations.
Vous n'avez pas vu le docteur ?
Si le ciel est bleu, alors pourquoi est-il transparent ? C'est étrange.
Le docteur dit souvent que je suis mignonne, mais je n'en comprends toujours pas le sens. Vous aussi, vous trouvez que je suis mignonne ?

Comme le fer rouille et se décompose, mon cœur aussi. Il rouille, se fissure, puis casse jusqu'à ce que mon corps tout entier se brise. Lorsque je me suis réveillée, l'institut de recherche était ravagé. C'était ma malédiction, celle de la rouille inhérente à la marionnette que je suis.

Je vous apprécie. Je vous aime. Marrions-nous... Ça ? Ce sont les mots que j'ai appris du docteur. Je ne sais pas ce qu'ils signifient, mais il semble que les dire à un maximum de gens aiguisera mes émotions. Sur ce...

Je vois, j'entends, et j'apprends de nouvelles choses chaque jour depuis mon arrivée ici... Je suis consciente d'avoir été considérablement influencée. Ce doit être le sentiment que l'on appelle bonheur.
Mes capacités se sont encore améliorées.
Je m'engage à exploiter au mieux cette nouvelle puissance.
Merci. Je suis heureuse... ou du moins j'imagine.
Dans la mesure du possible, je voudrais mettre cette puissance au service du plus grand nombre.
C'est une victoire... Je devrais me réjouir, n'est-ce pas ?
Vous revoilà, Maître. Par ici, je vous prie.
Maître... Où étiez-vous passé ? J'avais peur que quelque chose vous soit arrivé.
Une nouvelle journée nous attend, Maître. Si vous prévoyez une patrouille, je me chargerai de l'escorte.
Vous me trouvez trop sérieuse ? Pour être tout à fait honnête, Amleth m'a fait la même remarque. Il me semble pourtant agir normalement...
Cette épée n'était à l'origine pas destinée à protéger un maître, mais mon souhait est tout autre... Je suis sûre qu'Amleth saura l'exaucer.
Maître ? Je sais que c'est un peu cavalier de ma part, mais je vous recommande de faire une pause. Je me demande si vous ne travaillez pas un peu trop... J'ai l'impression de voir Amleth.
Votre façon de gouverner est différente de celle d'Amleth, mais les grandes lignes restent similaires... c'est très curieux.
Je vous souhaite un joyeux anniversaire. Aujourd'hui, je vous protègerai avec une détermination à ne pas laisser passer le moindre insecte, alors déployez vos ailes autant que vous le pouvez.
Sonya... Il semble qu'elle ait perdu sa famille à cause des cristaux maudits. Autrement dit, à cause de moi...
Est-ce que je peux t'aider, Amleth ? Tu fais du ménage... ? Non ! Tu dois me laisser ces tâches ingrates !
J'ai tant fait et pourtant, je mène toujours cette vie... Même si je consacre le reste de mon existence pour expier ce péché... ha... je me demande si j'arriverai à me racheter un jour...
Je suis aux côtés d'Amleth depuis que je suis toute petite. Elle est tout pour moi. Si je suis encore qualifiée pour le faire, alors j'aimerais à nouveau être à son service quand tout sera fini.

Maître... que savez-vous sur Amleth ? Je pourrai peut-être vous parler d'elle à l'occasion... Par exemple, quand elle était petite, le premier mot qu'elle a dit était « Oélia ». Tout à fait, mon nom. Et aussi...

Je continuerai sans doute à regretter cette époque encore longtemps, mais je dois être tournée vers l'avenir, pour le bien d'Amleth... C'est ma présence ici qui me l'a fait réaliser. Alors merci, Maître.
Il semble que je me sois légèrement renforcée.
La formation est essentielle. Surtout pour quelqu'un de faible comme moi...
Je vous rendrai l'attention que vous m'avez portée par mon travail. C'est le devoir qui incombe à la garde royale.
Cette quantité de pouvoir magique... n'est-ce pas trop pour moi ? Non, je ne douterai plus... même si cela doit me coûter la vie !
J'ai l'impression de pouvoir croire en ma force pour la première fois de ma vie. Merci, Maître.
Curieusement, je me sens apaisée... Suis-je devenue un peu plus forte ?
Je vous dédie cette victoire, Maître !
J'y vais ! Tout le monde à terre !
Ah, tu es revenu. Prends donc le commandement. Les préparatifs sont terminés.
Hm, tu en as mis du temps... Si tu comptes nous abandonner, c'est moi qui prendrai le relai.
Aucun tir de canon ni de pistolet, aucune odeur de poudre, pas d'eau boueuse... je n'aurais jamais pensé que le jour viendrait où je prendrais ces matins pour acquis.

C'est un pistolet magique modèle 1805, une arme basique que n'importe quelle sorcière peut utiliser. La poignée, la glissière, la gâchette... tout est fait sur mesure pour s'adapter à ma main. Je m'en servirai pour... non, rien.

Prendre soin de ses lunettes est tout aussi important que s'occuper de son arme... Si tu ne peux pas voir devant toi, tu pourras encore moins viser... Je suis complètement myope. J'ai été victime de gaz anti-émeute quand je vivais dans le quartier autonome.

Hé, tu forces trop. Un soldat doit savoir prendre du repos à la moindre occasion. En tant qu'officier ou général, tu ne peux pas afficher un air fatigué devant tes subordonnés. Si tu comprends ce que je dis, lève le pied et va te promener un peu.

Ta force me laisse un peu perplexe, mais j'imagine que je peux te voir comme un officier supérieur. La première qualité d'un commandant est de ne jamais se décourager. Je dois dire que tu possèdes cette qualité.
C'est ton anniversaire aujourd'hui, non ? C'est bien de ne pas vieillir dans les tranchées. Espérons que ça continuera comme ça.

L'approvisionnement est important. Comment feras-tu si tu as faim ? Enfin... j'imagine que tu peux manger autre chose que des boîtes de conserve ici. Regarde, quelqu'un est encore en train de faire cuire du pain... ça sent bon.

Galia était autrefois divisée entre nord et sud. Son unification forcée a débouché sur une guerre civile. C'est la troisième fois qu'une telle chose se produisait. Si cela arrive une quatrième fois, j'espère que ce sera le plus tard possible.

J'ai aidé Natasha à jardiner récemment... mais c'était la première fois que je manipulais le sol à des fins productives. Jusqu'à présent, quand j'attrapais une pelle, c'était surtout pour creuser une tranchée ou enterrer des corps... C'était très rafraîchissant.
Je pensais que vous seriez ceux qui me verraient mourir, mais vous m'avez tendu la main et non une lame ou une muselière... C'est pourquoi j'ai accepté de prendre ce risque.

Nous étions nombreuses dans le corps des sorcières. Nous avions toutes aune personnalité, des origines et des capacités très différentes. La seule chose qui nous reliait était cette quête de repères. Si elles t'avaient rencontré avant... elles seraient sûrement ici en train de rire à l'heure qu'il est.
Tant que tu seras là, je suis certaine qu'un jour les sorcières pourront vivre heureuses. J'aimerais tellement connaître cette époque.
Tu m'as donné de la force... ?
Les ombres se dissipent... Il semble que je sois encore en mesure de combattre.
Cette puissance de frappe... Je dois déterminer la meilleure façon de l'exploiter.
Si vous me faites confiance à ce point, je m'engage à vous rendre la pareille.
Ça faisait longtemps que je n'avais pas ressenti une telle fraîcheur... Pardonnez-moi, mais j'aimerais en profiter encore un peu...
Oui, je suis bien plus forte qu'à l'époque, mais... non. C'est pour cette raison que je ne laisserai personne mourir cette fois. Les balles de ce pistolet ne traverseront plus que nos ennemis.
Le plus grand danger guette au moment de la victoire. Ne baissez jamais votre garde.
Forget searching—I just wanna sleep the day away... Wh-Whaaa?! Did you just hear that...? Ahaha...

Ahh... Nothing beats chilling out... Now, I can forget about everything—especially this sword...and just relax the day away... Mmm...ahhh... If only time would just stand still... Huh?! My lord?! How long’ve ya been there?!
Nrrgh... Not yet... Any chance I can relax for just five more minutes? None? Okay...

There’re sooo many snacks here in Fran! My rural island doesn’t really have fancy snacks like these, so it feels like I’m in a whole new world! Hehe. I don’t even know what this crispy apple thingie’s called, but boy is it delish!!
Even while I’m searching day in and day out, my life’s slowly coming to an end... That’s why I gotta hurry and find this sword a master... Nrrgh... Why me, though...?

Even you wanna take a break once in a while, don’t ’cha, my lord? Once I find this sword a master, I wanna take it easy too. I’m so gonna kick back, relax, and fully enjoy some quality me time... Hehehehe...

I’m sure this sword’d suit ’cha perfectly, my lord. Much more than someone like me, at least. Huh? You already got your staff? Oh! Well, just hear me out now—you, the staff in one hand, the sword in the other. What ’cha say?
Happy birthday! Of course I got ’cha a present. Here’s your brand new swor—oh. You can’t hold onto it...? Shoulda known... Can ya try again next year...? I-It won’t hurt ’cha to try...

Ahh...what I’d give for a nice dip in a hot spring... My island’s west of the continent, and it’s got this huge hot spring... Or rather, that’s really all my island’s got going for it—just a hot spring and a legend of a cursed sword. Seriously.

I feel I’ve asked everyone under the sun holding a weapon to take this sword away, but I’ve had no luck. The Queen? Nope. Our knight friends? Nada. Y’know, I even asked a witch with a lotta shiny swords just now, but yup—another dead end. Oh, she prayed that I’d find the sword a master though... Hehe...that brightened my day...
Anyone this sword chooses to be its master can hold it like me. But if the sword doesn’t choose ’em, it’ll slip right through their fingers. So weird, isn’t it...?

I dunno why, but the knights here’ve been telling me to hold the sword correctly... Can ya blame me, though?! I’ve never even learned how to hold one in the first place! ...Still, I feel the sword’s telling me that I’m doing a good job! No, really!

I’m sure there’s someone out there worthier of this sword than me... I don’t know—I just feel like some good-for-nothing who has no business swinging it around... Still, why me...? Well, if ya say I was chosen by the sword...I’d feel a bit better. Just an itty-bitty, teensy-weensy bit better, though.

...I don’t ask for much, so I wonder if there’s a strong, kind, rich gentleman out there who’ll never get mad at me for slacking off, take care of all the chores while helping me track down a master for this sword, and find it in his humooooongous heart of gold to take me in... My lord...could it be...?
Did I just get stronger? Oh, I guess the sword does feels sharper.
Dangit, I’ve gotten stronger again... I’m losing more and more of my precious me time...
Now that I’ve gotten stronger today, it’s off to bed I go. ...But, going to bed’s not gonna calm me down... There’s something telling me I’d better go and continue my search...
Huh? I-I’m not a Viking. Oh, this armor? When I picked the sword up, this armor just kinda put itself on me... I think it’s probably some kind of curse too...
For some reason, I feel absolutely pumped...! Alright—gonna work my butt off some more today!! ...Oh, actually never mind. For a second there, I really thought I wanted to do some work...

Nrgh... I just wanna leave this sword with someone and get some shut-eye...!! Ahh, but not just anyone will do, right? It’s gotta be someone worthier of this sword than me. Hah... As much of a hassle as it is, today I’m gonna continue my search!
We won...?! Phew... I can relax for now...
If Vee becomes a fish, would she be able to swim in the rain too?
...Umm... Ah, it’s you, Mister! Long time no see~! Vee hasn’t seen you in a while, so she almost forgot about you.
The water’s going pitter-patter with laughter. It says, “Today’s gonna be sunny.”
You’re asking what Vee’s doing? Right now, she’s wanting to become a snail. She’s wanting to liiiie down and go sloooow.
There are lotsa witch girls here who are just like Vee, huh? They won’t call her weird, right? Hopefully Vee can make lotsa friends...
You’re tired, Mister. Vee can tell. Your water’s going gurgle-gurgle. Come here... You’re always working so hard. Vee’s proud of you. Good boy. Now, 1-2-3-4, throw tiredness out the door~!
No one can see the red fishies swimming around Vee. They’re so cute and pretty though... Hey Mister, can you see them...? Wah...! Hehehe~ Vee knew she’d like you, Mister.
Today’s your birthday, Mister? Happy birthday! ...You’re asking Vee how she knows? Well, all the waters are celebrating. They sure love you, don’t they, Mister? Vee does too. Hehe.
Everyone in the village called Vee a weird kid, but she had one friend—Lou. She was Vee’s one and only best friend.
Mimi said that a cat’s favorite food is fish. She had a huge smile when she said fish are yummiest when roasted on an open fire and eaten, bones and all... Is Mimi gonna eat Vee too...?

Huh? You brought some water for us to drink together? So, you mean... N-No, it’s n-nothing, just... Rrngh, everyone’s watching, y’know... Just what are you thinking, Mister Dumb-Dumb...? Vee hates you.
There was someone cooking in the kitchen, so Vee helped them out. It brought back some good memories, so when Vee told them they were like a grandma...they got really mad. Vee was so scared...
Vee loves baths. She gets a little, aaahhhh, and then really, hhhoooo. Heh, just thinking about baths makes Vee wanna warm up... Is it bath time yet?
Today a friend’s gonna come and hang out. Vee promised to show them around to many places in town... Vee looks weird, doesn’t she? Really? Oh—it’s about time to go. Alright, see you later!
Vee feels a little bubbly-bubbly. If she keeps this up, will she be able to swim in the sky too?
The fishies are happy too. They said, “Thank you.”
Mister, your power makes Vee feel like she’s floating in water. She feels so safe.
Are you happy now that Vee’s stronger? If you’re happy, Mister, then Vee’s happy too.
Hey, um... Vee’s chest has been feeling warm and fuzzy for some time now. With one look at you, Vee’s water feels kind of... Rrnngh... Why is Vee getting so hot...?
Easy-breezy, right? The fishies are happy too.
W-Welcome back, Master. I’m so, so glad... You didn’t abandon me, after all.
I’m going to follow you forever and ever and ever, Master. I am!
Just stay put, Master. I’m not gonna let you out of my sight. I won’t! I’m gonna stay here and keep watch, because...b-b-because if I let you go off too far from me...you might not come back...

My former master told me to stay and wait for him, and I did. I did wait. I waited for so long. ...But he never came back, and... Master, if you’re gonna leave me behind you have to tell me, okay? If you don’t...I’ll...I’ll wait for you forever...
You look very extra tired, Master! That’s what your face is saying, it is! You should hit the pack for a little bit...! I’ll watch over you the whole time, so you don’t need to worry about a thing.

For a long, long time, I didn’t know there was anything in the world that wasn’t scary or painful, I didn’t... But then I met you, Master, and I learned so many new things. Compassion, joy... I’m really, really happy that I met such a very extra kind person like you, Master.

Happy birthday, Master! Today is a very much special day, it is! I know everyone will want to spend time with you today, so don’t worry about m—huh? I can come along, too? Yes! I’d love to! I really, really would!
Snff... I’m...I’m fine. I’m not crying. I’m not... It’s just... I...I woke up and you weren’t here, Master...hck... C-Could you please make sure to wake me up, next time, Master? Snff...

Master...I know you said I can’t come with you, I know I can’t, but can I please, please just wait outside the door for you? No? ...B-But why would it be embarrassing? T-The rest room? Aww, but I always watch over you when you rest! I promise, I’ll make sure no one interrupts your nap!

My former master never taught me anything. He didn’t. He’d always just say, “You don’t need to think...” and “Get back to work...” That’s why it took me a really, really long time to learn to speak. ...I’ve worked very extra hard to teach myself, and I can do it now, but...you’d tell me if I was talking weird, right?

Snff...hck... I’m fine, Master. ...Really, I am. I’m ready, s-so let’s just get it over with! ...Huh? Y-You’re going to put me in that pot and cook me, right? Why else have all that hot wat—huh? So...you call this...a baaatttthhh?

Master! It’s bathtime! It is! It’s time for very extra toasty, comfy, bubbly water! We’ve gotta splash in the bubbles together, Master! I even brought this really, really nice hat that Belle made me to keep the bubbles out of my eyes! Come on, let’s go, Master! Let’s go!

Are you going out, Master? Have fun outside, okay...? Yep, I’ll be waiting for you right here. It’s alright, I know you’ll definitely for sure come back. I know you’d never, ever, ever leave me behind...so I’m okay on my own now. I am. But...try to not to stay out too too long, okay...?
M-Me? Do you mean me? Thank you...
I’m going to try even harder from now on! I bow-wow will!
Wh-Wha—!! I’m...I’m...more bowawawah?!  Master, what should I—! ...I-I’ve gotta calm down. Right, calm down. Okay, this calls for my Bow-Wow-Wow Special! Hehe! Oh, this is very extra good, it is!

I still get scared of people sometimes... I can’t help watching their hands, even though I know that no one here is gonna hit me. ...Hm? It’s kinda strange, but... I’m never scared of your hands, Master. Never ever ever. You really are very extra strange, Master.

There’s so many things I never knew before I joined you, Master. Beds, and baths, and snacks and things...so many new things. And everyone...they all took the time to show me everything. I really love all my new friends, I do. ...And Master, I love you, too. You’re my very most favorite person ever.

Master? Could... Could you pet me lots and lots and very extra much? Hehe...that’s right. I’m not even a little bit afraid, anymore. Not of you, Master. Your hands are always gentle... I’m so, so happy I was taken in by someone as kind as you, Master. I am.
We... We won? Really?! We did?!
Snff...hck... A-Am I going to be abandoned, again?
Ahh... Ahh, m-my lord...! Hehehe... I-I was w-waiting for you...
...! M-My lord! Aaah... You’re back... I-I-I was w-worried I wouldn’t be able to see you again... Heh...hehe... Thank goodness... Thank goodness...
L-Let’s...uh-um... Let’s g-give it our all...today... Ah—you’re not m-mad, are you? Heh...hehe...
Ah...umm... S-Sorry. I-I know I’m clumsy...but...uh...I wanted to see if I could help you, my lord... I-Is there anything...I-I can do for you...?
U-Until now...e-everyone has always...talked behind my back, bullied me, betrayed me... B-But, you’re d-different from them, my lord... Th-That makes me h-happy. Hehe...
M-My lord...um... I-I was just thinking...about how you should rest a little... Ah—I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I-I was being too pushy, huh...?
Ah-umm... M-My lord... I-I... Ummm... A-Ahh... Hehe... Hehehe... Hehehehe...

I-I heard...it’s your b-birthday... Oh, ah... H-Happy birthday... Th-This gift’s for you... Y-You probably won’t like it since I was the one who ch-chose it, but...if that’s still o-okay with you... H-Here...
E-Everyone here’s s-so nice... B-But, if anyone becomes my f-friend, and they start h-hating me, w-w-what should I do...?
I-I can relax when I’m by myself, b-but...I h-hate being...lonely... Th-Th-That’s why, ah-umm... B-Being with you, m-my lord, makes me...s-so...umm...h-happy... Hehehe...
Th-That girl... She just looked at me... Ahh, someone else...hates me... ...Huh? Sh-She doesn’t...?
My lord, hehehe... I-It’s been a while since w-we first met, huh...? I-Is it okay...if I think of y-you as...my friend? Hehe...my friend.

Hey, my lord... A-Am I doing anything that bugs you...? I-If I am, let me know, okay? Just be honest with whatever it is and I promise to make it right... That’s why, please...I want you to keep watching me...

Hehehe...hehe... My lord...I can tell just by the look on your face. I feel the same way, too... You know, I have complete trust in you...but if you stab me in the back...I wonder what I’ll end up doing... Hehe...hehehe...
Wh-Whaaa...? I-Is it o-okay for m-me to have this...?
Y-You’re giving me more...?! A-Are you sure...?!
M-My lord... Th-This makes me...happy... Hehehe...
I... I-I’ve made my mind up. I’m gonna put my trust in you, my lord. I-I mean, you did make me this strong... Hehe...hehehe...

It’s the first time this has ever happened... The first time that someone has never betrayed me. Hey, my lord... You’ll be my friend forever...and ever, right? Mine and mine alone... Ahahahaha! Ahahahahahaha!
Thank you for believing someone like me, my lord... Hey...have you noticed? The only thing you haven’t done for me...is betray me. I’m ready for it...whenever. Heh...hehe...hehehehe...
That’s what they get for laughing at me... Hehe... Ahahaha!
N-No way... I-It’s all my fault, isn’t it...? Uuu...
Shut up, shut up, shut up!!
No looking, no laughing—just go away!!
...! Long time no see... I’m happy... You’re still alive.
Remember... Strike while the iron’s hot... Now then, shall we begin?
Unacceptable... This iron’s inadequate. It won’t be able to stand heat... Oh, my lord... How long were you...? When I get absorbed in my work, I stop noticing anything around me... I’m ashamed...
Why don’t I use my hammer to fight? Preposterous... This is a tool for forging weapons... Fighting using smithing tools—inappropriate. Blades too... Using one’s wares to fight—third-rate.
I’m worried... You look very tired. Get rest... People are very...fragile, after all...

Thank you. I’m terrible at speaking to people... But, you actually wait for my words to come out. That makes me very happy... I’ve got to get better at speaking... Because, I want to talk a lot with you, my lord...
Cheers... Today’s a great day... Happy birthday... I’ve only ever made weapons, but maybe I can make a model of a cake. You want?
...Warning. My conversations—terrible... You might feel uncomfortable... I’m not the best person to talk to... Better off finding someone else...

I thought a strong weapon could save someone from dying, so I kept making weapons. Strong weapons that could protect their owners... But, I was wrong... In the end, weapons are only tools for murder...

I’m confused. Everyone pats my head...a lot. That’s a disrespectful way to treat someone older... Huh? Me—the same age as Soltina? ...Incorrect. Older. Illya and Belle? Nnrrgh, older... I’m closest in age to Hathor and Lunalynn. ...Hm? Is that so surprising?

Are you making sure you’re reforging your weapons? It takes time, but keep at it, and you’ll bring out your weapons’ power. ...Ah! That reminds me. I think there’s a way to cut down the time it takes to reforge... I don’t know much about it, but maybe Richesse does.

I thought quickly winning a fight would end it. So, I created that sword—that horrible, murderous symbol of power. I’m sure that’s what I wished for back then—for more people to be killed... That’s why, I can’t say I’m completely innocent...

Richesse has always walked in front of me, leading me by the hand... This whole time, I thought that was good enough for me. But, now I know it’s not. I want to walk alongside her—not behind...so I can feel proud when I call her, my partner...
Power stirs inside me... What is this...?
I’m shining like a finely sharpened blade... I’m grateful... Thank you, my lord...
Thank you. I’ll be sure to meet any expectations you have in me... That’s common courtesy...says Richesse...
Even with hands this filthy, if I can still create something...I’ve got to do it... With these two hands, I’ll forge a weapon that’ll change the world...

A weapon’s just a thing that exists. But, treat it with affection, and it’ll surely return that affection to you... I also want to return your feelings in that way... To do that, I’ve got to hone my power even more...

As long as people fight, they’ll want weapons. So, it’s time for me to stop running...from my past, and my sins. I’ll create a legendary weapon that’ll cut a path to the future, and end this war... I’ll be okay. If you and Richesse are with me, I won’t break... Not anymore...!
Well, if it isn’t my favorite customer! I haven’t seen you pop in for a while, so I was sure you had... Oh, no. Forget I said anything.
Alright, time to get out there and make some money.

Nrrgh, where did they go...? Oh hey, my favorite customer! I was doing a head count of the flabbycatties, but one’s missing... C’mon Boss, this isn’t good! You gotta actually watch...huh? What exactly are these things? They’re exactly what you see—just ordinary, run-of-the-mill flabbycatties.

If someone seeks help, deliver what they need. That’s my golden rule. I’ve seen many deaths that could’ve been prevented if supplies had been delivered sooner. So, I became the Merchant of Death, knowing full well what it means to keep one side of a battle alive.
Huh? You’re looking a bit burnt out, my favorite customer. If you’re buried in so much work that you need a helping paw, the flabbycatties and I got you covered... Of course...for free!

Merchants like me got a trick for surviving—we never stay in one place. We gotta be ready to run away at a moment’s notice. But, I feel safe next to you, my favorite customer. Hehe... It’s nice having a place to go home to.

Happy birthday, my favorite customer! I’m running a special birthday sale just for you~! There’s cake, everyday essentials, and even a coupon you can redeem for one date with yours truly. So, what’ll it be?

A war orphan like me doesn’t have many paths to choose from. I’m a part of war whether I like it or not. That’s why I decided to become a battlefield merchant. I’ve seen so many lives that would’ve been saved if they just had supplies...

Do you know about runes? They’re crystalized masses of magic power, and they strengthen different abilities depending on their source of power. But, if you leave them as mystery runes, you won’t be able to see what power’s inside... Basically, what you get depends on Lady Luck.

Artie’s a skilled blacksmith, but she can be a bit unstable at times... Make sure you treat her nicely, okay? You’re the only one other than me who she’s taken a liking to, after all. Oh, but, remember, I’m her partner, got it?

Wait, are those sugar cubes?! Oh, no, I don’t want any... Those just happen to be the flabbycatties’ favorite food... Oh, be careful though. Sugary snacks make them multiply. Also, fruit makes them gigantic, and candy makes them tiny, hehe, just in case you wanted to see for yourself~

Which do you think is evil, a weapon or a person? A person can’t protect themselves with a weak weapon, so I fully understand Artie’s feelings about wanting to creating strong weapons for peace... She just made a mistake in choosing her buyer, not in choosing what to believe in.

Soon, the world won’t need the Merchant of Death. And you, my favorite customer, are gonna make it happen, right? Oh, but, then I’d have to look for a new job, huh...? Well, I guess I’ll just make that your responsibility, my favorite customer~ Huh? You’re fine with that? Seriously?!
Thank you, my favorite customer. I guarantee you’ll get your money’s worth.
Well now... If I don’t provide you with quality service, I’m gonna have a price to pay, hehe.
Thank you as always, my favorite customer. From now on, I’ll put in even more work, so keep your expectations high. Oh, but business is business—the only one who can outperform me is me.

What’s that, my favorite customer? Are you interested in a flabbycatty by any chance? Um, well, Smile can be a bit cold... Oh, Angry, the one by your feet, can get quite rough, so forget about them! For first-timers like you, I recommend Twins. This flabbycatty’s just so friendly and down-to-earth~!

Hey there! Welcome to the Fran branch of Richesse’s traveling shop! It’s an exclusive VIP shop where only the chosen may enter. Yes...this hidden chamber of secrets is reserved solely for you, the Duke of Fran, and myself... Hehe. Oh, sorry, did you actually believe me?

If someone seeks help, deliver what they need. That’s my golden rule... Brave this cursed world, and deliver peace and hope to people stricken with fear. That’s something I should do—something I can do. Of course, I got you to help me, right my favorite customer~?♪
Uh oh... Gotta close up shop and hightail it outta here.
Things are about to get reeeal flashy!
Ah, the wind feels quite pleasant...
We’ve had quite the long vacation, sir. Have you had your fill? Or, would you like to relax a little longer here with me?
Have you done your warming-up exercises? Tediousness is no excuse for skipping them. You’ll be out of your element in the water, after all.

Ah, sir. Have you seen Moddey? Apparently she’s never been in the water before, so I thought it would be best to teach her how to swim...but any moment I try to get her under the water, she ends up running away... I do hope she can overcome this predicament...
Sir... I’ve heard this entire stretch of land belongs to Primavera, but is that true? I did have the impression she was a lady of prestige...but certainly not to this extent...
Fatigue’s written all over your face, sir. Is it from accompanying the children? Their energy can indeed keep one’s hands full. Take this opportunity to rest. I’ll see to the children in your stead.

Pardon me, sir, but...are you fine being here with me? Surely, there must be others you would rather spend time with... I see... No, it’s nothing. I just never thought there’d come a day where you and I could relax and just listen to the sound of the wind... Hehe. You’ve given me a memory I’ll always treasure.

So, today’s your birthday. Ah, yes—supposedly there’s a cafe up ahead with a view of the whole lake. Its beautiful sunset makes lovers from far and wide see it as a sacred place, and any two who go together are bound to get marr...ah... Th-That wasn’t my intention. My apologies.

This outfit, sir? I bought it from Richesse. If I’m not mistaken, it’s called a “swimsuit,” and can be used for underwater operations... If you’re interested in one, I recommend seeing Richesse. She had a wide selection to choose from.
Ah, sir...here you are. Um... If you have a moment, why don’t we relax and have a chat? We should take it easy now before this chance passes us by...

Is there anything you have trouble dealing with, sir? There’s nothing like that for me, per se, but there are things I must conquer. Flames, the stench of gunpowder... All these things, I must eventually overcome. After all, my mother doesn’t wish for me to just cry and do nothing.

You said we came here to rejuvenate our strength, but are you getting proper rest, sir? We need to spend times like this wisely on ourselves. Don’t simply idle about—rest until you feel completely refreshed. Even my drowsy commanding officer often said refreshing oneself is important work.

Moddey ran away again. What exactly am I doing wrong? I’ve even tried adopting the soft, gentle tone Valeriede uses when speaking to Nina, like, “See, there’s nothing to be scared about. Come on now.” ...Hm? This is how Valeriede always speaks to Nina.

Once we finish our vacation, our fight will resume. Does that worry me? Not in the slightest... If I were alone, the illusions of my past would likely still be haunting me...but now I have comrades who I must protect. I’ll show you I can grow even stronger, so that one day, I can protect you too...
I may have overcome my trauma...but this new me still has plenty of growing up to do.

Aversions and shortcomings—no one understands them better than I do. It certainly would be upsetting if someone else lectured me about what to do about mine...just like what I did to Moddey... I owe her an apology...
I thought I’d made Moddey angry with me, but apparently I was reading everything the wrong way. Well, it’s true that I offended her to some extent...but I also caused you to worry. Forgive me.

For my first time taking charge of others, I barely kept myself together... The experience has made me more sympathetic towards the hardships you face. It must’ve been hard for my commanding officer too. It truly was trying... One became lost again, and again, and... Huh? She’s a special case?

A witch’s power comes from the heart. There are memories that shackle me... My mother vanishing into the flames, the screams of souls being burned alive... The moment I decided to bear those shackles and move forward, a new power awakened within me... With this power, I know I can protect my comrades, and you.
I’m the one to blame... Forgive me.
Keep your hands off my comrades!
An attack like that won’t work on me anymore!
Nnrrggh... Moddey feels kinda... C-Can you please not stare at me?!
Ah!! Finally! Just where in the world have you been, m’lord?! I’ve been here putting up with all this embarrassment, waiting to get going, so I expect you to show up too, okay?!

Nnrrgh... Why does this swimsuit gotta be so darn tiny...? It’s practically underwear...! Huh? I look cute in it? Wh-What the heck?! Of all the things you could’ve said, m’lord... You’re really asking for it!

Why are you letting me borrow your coat, m’lord? So I don’t feel embarrassed? Oh, th-thank you... Nnrrgh... It’s me who should be taking care of you though... Hmph. Just you wait, m’lord. Next time, I’m gonna take care of you even more!

Am I getting magic power from the summer, or something? I feel being adventurous with my outfit lets me say things I’d normally be too embarrassed to say... To tell you the truth, my ever so kind and gentle lord, I like you... Hehehe! Oh, the look on your face! Betcha believed me, didn’t ’cha?

Aren’t you hot, m’lord? Here, I got you a cold drink and a towel. If there’s anything else you want... You wanna take a nap? I knew you were gonna say that, so I also made sure to have a parasol and beach chair ready for you. And, I’ll even throw in a snuggle with yours truly if you want. Hehehe!

You know how a witch’s power comes from the heart? Well, if their heart goes through emotional changes, their power and soul will be affected. That means, if their heart is crushed by negative emotions, their power will distort, and cause the witch to rage out of control. Betcha didn’t know that!

Happy birthday, m’lord! Moddey here’s gonna give you a special gift just for today. You can look at me in my swimsuit as much as you like! Whatcha say, you lucky guy? ...W-Wait. You really are... Uuu, on second thought, stop looking!!

Since long ago, waterfronts were places lost spirits could easily find their way to. That probably explains the fog. Lost spirits feel so much pain from longing to see someone... Maybe that’s why they’ve always flocked to loud, crowded places.
One time I slipped and fell into a river, but Laila was the first to jump in and save me. She was such a good girl, always by my side, always protecting me.

It’s. So. HOOOT! Ugh, I can’t take this anymore! This heat’s gonna melt my ears and tail right off...! I’m sure a dip in the water will make the pain go away...but it’s so scary... M’lord...you gotta do something...!

How can everyone walk outside in those shameless outfits like it’s nothing...?! Sabrina’s wearing a swimsuit, Hathor’s outfit basically is one, and Belle’s practically naked...! Am I the weirdo for feeling embarrassed...?

Since I’m always doing my best, you want to take care of me anytime I’m having a bad day? Are you sure? Actually, ever since Dad and Laila passed away, every day’s been...gotcha! Didya think I was crying? Joke’s on you! Hehehe. ...But, when I really am feeling tired, I might just take you up on that offer.

A gravekeeper’s job is to ensure the departed are resting peacefully in their graves. But, it’s also nice to make them smile while they’re still with us, right? The only gravekeeper who can take care of someone from the cradle to the grave is me, after all. So, m’lord, want me to take care of ya until it’s your time to go?
A long time ago, I almost drowned in a river...so me and water still kiiinda don’t get along... Aha...
Hmph! ...I-I can do the doggy paddle, y’know... Laila taught me how...
This floaty ring is the best thing ever! Now, I’ll be safe and sound even if I can’t swim... Huh? Ah! Don’t let go! I’m still practicing!
Huh? There’s something in the lake! What in the world is that?! It’s like a small, floaty umbrella! I’ve never seen anything so cool!

Dan-da-dan~! Now I can swim all by myself. I got my floaty ring, and I know Laila’s always watching over me, so I know I’ll be A-okay. Come to think of it, can you swim, m’lord? If you ask nicely, Moddey here might just be able to teach you.

Thank you, m’lord. We had so much fun playing in the water together, I can barely remember I was even scared of it. To show my appreciation, I’ll be sure to take care of you a whooole lot more from now on, okay? Hehehe!
Hah hah~! Piece of cake! ...Huh? N-No! Anything but water... Anything!!
Oh nooo... There’s a hole in my floaty ring...!

Memo: CharacterProfileMB

Une apprentie domestique affiliée à votre domaine qui aspire à devenir servante. Elle est réservée, pacifiste, et ne lâche jamais rien. Vous l'avez prise sous votre aile après qu'elle fut chassée de nombreux fiefs en raison de sa nature de sorcière.

Everglow
Une chanson de Daoko

Adieu, ô soleil disparaissant à l'horizon
Une voix esseulée fleurit tel un écho dans mon esprit
Passé ou présent, une multitude de prières se confond en chant

Mon cœur s'imbibe dans cette cité à la pluie incessante
J'aimerais que nos rires ensemble résonnent

J'observe mon calendrier en attendant le matin

La liberté est-t-elle donc mon seul salut ?

C'est un adieu immuable

Ce monde change en un clin d'œil

Un éclat d'azur perce les nuages moroses

J'attends le matin en me cachant de cette anxiété nocturne étouffante

Je me disais en rêve qu'il n'y avait pas à avoir peur

Mes pieds foulent une fois de plus le sol, loin de ces jours d'antan
Je tiens ta main dans la mienne

Un blizzard de fleurs virevolte

Là où le clair de lune resplendit

Everglow

Petals of wish pour down on us
Come with me, let's go to see the moonlight
Come with me, let's go to see the moonlight

Fille unique d'un noble déchu. Elle jouit d'une personnalité radieuse et aimable tout en faisant preuve de sérieux et d'inflexibilité. D'aucuns disent qu'elle est née avec un pouvoir que nulle autre sorcière ne possède. Sa véritable nature reste voilée de mystères.

Elle est entrée à son service après que le duc lui ait offert refuge malgré sa nature de sorcière. Elle fait preuve de sérieux, de rigidité, et son dévouement envers son seigneur est sans égal.

Diseuse de bonne aventure mystérieuse et envoûtante qui était religieuse. L'Église utilisa son don de voyance au profit de la chasse aux sorcières. Elle fut éconduite et pourchassée lorsqu'elle tenta de s'enfuir. Intriguée par l'avenir du Duc, elle décide de rejoindre ses rangs afin de témoigner de sa destinée hors du commun.

My Stuffed Bear

Forever

My bear, no need to worry

me and you, we'll get through
Wait for me, I'll be there,
just you wait and you'll see

Jeune fille originaire de Galia. Membre d'une troupe de cirque qui pérégrinait à travers le continent, son numéro d'as de la gâchette était acclamé par tous. Son bagou naturel en déroute plus d'un, mais elle a le sens du spectacle et aime apporter de la joie autour d'elle.

Une fillette abandonnée qui pense qu'elle est simplement perdue et qui erre ici et là, à la recherche de son foyer. Accusée à tort de vol sans personne pour croire en son innocence, elle tombe dans le désarroi et la solitude. Convaincue que les petits fripons n'ont pas le droit de rentrer à la maison, elle se refuse à voler quoi que ce soit, même affamée.

Jeune fille d'une famille de noble déchue qui a été élevée en tant que chevalier. Une nonne complaisante à la foi inébranlable. Pour elle, chaque souffrance est une épreuve de Dieu à laquelle elle fait scrupuleusement face. Elle est très attachée à son amie d'enfance Florence.

Une jeune fille aux attributs canins remuant sa queue et implorant avec ses yeux de chiot pour qu'on prenne soin d'elle. Pensant avoir tué sa sœur qui était tout pour elle, le chagrin de Cerberus la transforma en sorcière de Qlipha.
Mon maître, vous ne me caressez pas la tête aujourd'hui ?

Sorcière de Qlipha demeurant au fond du lac du royaume de Chekkos. Pendant près de 100 ans, la pluie de Rusalka s'abattit inlassablement sur le royaume, submergeant la plupart de ses terres. De physionomie fragile, elle passe son temps à dormir ou à se plonger dans ses livres, en particulier des romans à l'eau de rose.

Originaire de la principauté de Brook, elle est la sœur aînée de Soltina qu'elle aime par dessus tout. Lunalynn s'est sacrifiée afin de sauver sa sœur en se laissant capturer par l'Inquisition. Ses pouvoirs de sorcière se sont éveillés suite aux tortures qu'elle a endurées. Elle est plutôt pessimiste et son manque de confiance la pousse à présenter excessivement des excuses.
S'il y a quelque chose que je puisse faire pour aider...

Ⅷ. THE FIRE
Une chanson de Valeriede (Rie Tanaka)

Ce qui flotte au creux des ténèbres
Tel un vestige vacillant
Est immanquablement réduit en cendres
Ô, piètre mélodie !

Cesse donc de murmurer
Mon pauvre cœur meurtri sur le point de se rompre

De sombres flammes s'embrasent et consument mon cœur
Si je cède à leur éclat, je ne pourrai plus rebrousser chemin
Je vocifère de désespoir jusqu'à m'égosiller
Ce tendre sourire qui m'a un jour aimée est si loin
Comme je te regrette

Un jardin baigné dans la lumière du soleil
Dans lequel retentissaient des voix enjouées
Le son d'une cloche fait écho
Et annonce l'arrivée du crépuscule

Ne te fais pas berner
Espoir qui s'efface telle une brume de chaleur en été

Des flammes s'embrasent dans le ciel
Et réduisent en cendres
Tout ce qui m'est cher
Des plumes tombent des ailes dansantes au gré du vent
Je tends les mains au ciel pour les attraper au vol
Vaine tentative qui me fait sombrer dans la folie

Prenons-nous par la main et rentrons à la maison
Nous gagnerons un lieu empli de félicité
Fleurs, amour et songes s'affadissent tous en blanc
Viens, je te guiderai
Jusqu'à atteindre la sérénité

Ⅷ. THE FIRE

As I walk through the ashes of
what I used to call my humble abode
In what used to be a vibrant home to us,
full of glee
Now remains a sad melody

Little voices crying for help

Bitter tragedy I can't escape from

Knowing that I lost you

In this empty and ruined backyard,

I remember so well
little laughters fill the air through

Why did it become like this?

Smoke darkens through the sky

Might as well ravage through

Une sorcière qui était à la tête d'un orphelinat. Des gens pernicieux brulèrent ce dernier parce que Valeriede y avait abrité une sorcière. De nature douce et patiente, elle brûle désormais du feu de la vengeance et est prête à en découdre avec ses ennemis.

Ce monde m'a dérobé tout ce que j'avais
et je l'abhorre. Mais, à présent...

Ⅶ. THE RUST

Should I speak out my mind?
Should I cross the line and lose
my hesitation to improvise and find

Or should I just stay and wait to decay?

I made up my mind
I will cross the line and use
this newfound freedom to navigate my life
Knowing that everything is temporary
I'd rather cherish my life till the end

Un homoncule artificiellement créé par une sorcière. A.A. a vécu toute sa vie comme sujet d'expérimentation humaine dans un laboratoire. Bien qu'elle soit dépourvue d'émotion, il semblerait qu'elle aime comme sa propre mère Mertillier, celle qui l'a créée.
Je ne suis qu'une simple marionnette.

Chevalier de la garde royale du royaume de Vyde au service de la reine Amleth, son amie d'enfance. Elle peut paraître austère et inflexible, mais elle n'en reste pas moins fière et zélée envers ses devoirs. Son affection envers Amleth fut exploitée par la papesse, ce qui engendra l'éveil d'Ophelia en tant que Sorcière des cristaux maudits.
Sur cette épée, je jure de ne plus dévier du droit chemin !

Soldate du royaume de Galia qui, durant la guerre civile, a fait prévaloir le Nord pourtant en infériorité numérique grâce au corps de sorcières. Alors qu'Armstrong fut acclamée comme héros du royaume, les hauts dirigeants complotèrent contre elle et finirent par massacrer son escouade. Obnubilée par la vengeance, elle devint une sorcière de Qlipha et s'empara de la capitale au moyen de ses ombres qui volent la vie de quiconque les touche.
Je sais que mes derniers instants sur cette Terre ne seront pas paisibles.

A brilliant home tutor of many students. In a city gripped with fear and mistrust, a rumor about her spreads, claiming that she “turns children into witches.” But when she is about to be executed, she is saved by the Duke. Sophia is a calm, wise educator who is very thoughtful towards everyone.

A blacksmith who creates strong weapons augmented by magic. Shy and socially awkward, she ​depends on the one person she has opened her heart to—her “partner” Richesse. Artie is burdened with remorse, as she created a weapon to protect lives, only for it to end many more of them.

I took one look at my hands,
and all I saw was filth...

A traveling weapon merchant with one golden rule, “If someone seeks help, deliver what they need.” She easily gets along with others, but is overprotective of her partner Artie. At times, Richesse speaks with insight gained from her many experiences with the cruelties of war.

If someone seeks help,
deliver what they need...

Song by Eri Sasaki

Just gazing beyond the crashing waves
Takes me to a place full of memories
You easily got caught telling little white lies
Embrassment’s written all over your face
Twilight’s about to tinge the sky
Until then, let’s relax side by side
I hope you don’t see how hot I’m getting

Now, they’re gone with the waves

Before our heartbeats intertwine

Before Our Heartbeats Intertwine

I just pretend as if I can’t see through

Side by side, let’s take it slow, no rush
Hoping you don’t see my heart race
Should I have kept my cool?

Everything drifts away

I hope they do
What lies beyond the words you gave to me
A world unfolding, waiting for us to see
“Stay with me forever”
With the sound of waves
Here, just you and me
I close my eyes, and let the breeze take me away

Before our heartbeats intertwine and dance
I just can’t let the sun go down and fade
A hidden melody we both unlock
Every beat syncs with the ticking clock

Time stood still, there was a silent hush
Not even a whisper
Our two hues blend softly, melt in the sky
You and I
In the sunlight, awkward silence
Lingers between the two of us
The sunlight gone, the night has come
Beyond the dark, we are casting our regrets
Our gazes cross and miss
Out of reach, words are lost
Thought I knew your heart
But now a wall between us keeps us apart

Wanna be closer, just a bit
My fingertips brush yours softly
But you don’t see me
Gazing as your hair sways in the ocean breeze
I wish we could escape from this
moment and be at ease
In this tranquil night
The moon is too bright
The waves hum masks the silence between us

With you in mind, my heart tightens and aches
I try to forget, but it’s hard to fake
Every breath I take feels like a mistake
And it’s a pain I’ll carry whatever it takes

Before our heartbeats intertwine and dance
I just can’t let the sun go down and fade
A hidden melody we both unlock
Every beat syncs with the ticking clock

A soldier rejuvenating her strength at a songstress’s private villa. Tasked with watching over her younger allies, Sabrina zealously answers the call of duty. When she tries teaching a gravekeeper who fears water how to swim, it proves to be a harrowing ordeal for the first-time teacher.

I will not fail in completing this mission.
This mission called, “vacation...!”
